title: Sing-Along Star
description: [Name] belts out every song on the radio, even the ads.

title: Snack Attack
description: [Name] can't resist opening every snack in the car within the first hour.

title: Navigation Novice
description: [Name] insists on navigating and gets the group slightly lost.

title: Caffeine Connoisseur
description: [Name] demands pit stops for coffee at every service station.

title: Photo Frenzy
description: [Name] insists on taking selfies at every scenic spot.

title: Restroom Roulette
description: [Name] has to use the bathroom right after the car gets back on the highway.

title: Gas Gauge Gambler
description: [Name] lets the fuel run dangerously low claiming, 'I know my car.'

title: License Plate Bingo
description: [Name] spots out-of-state license plates and shouts them out excitedly.

title: Car DJ
description: [Name] keeps switching the music tracks halfway through.

title: Roadside Attraction Advocate
description: [Name] pleads to stop at every kitschy roadside attraction.

title: Pit Stop Pro
description: [Name] is the quickest during restroom and snack breaks.

title: Karaoke Kraziness
description: [Name] starts an impromptu karaoke session in the car.

title: Deep Thoughts Driver
description: [Name] gets philosophical, initiating deep conversations.

title: Sleepy Co-Pilot
description: [Name] falls asleep within minutes of their 'shift' as the designated co-pilot.

title: Stargazing Enthusiast
description: [Name] insists on stopping the car for a stargazing break at night.

title: Gadget Guru
description: [Name]'s phone or camera battery dies from overuse before the first stop.

title: Backseat Driver
description: [Name] gives unsolicited driving advice from the backseat.

title: Lunchtime Leader
description: [Name] decides on an unusual place for lunch, leading to a memorable meal.

title: Animal Spotter
description: [Name] gets overly excited about wildlife seen from the window.

title: Memory Maker
description: [Name] insists on a group picture at every state or city sign crossed.
